userStories.title: Set up backend with FastAPI
userStories.description: Create the Master Control Panel backend using FastAPI with WebSocket support, SQLAlchemy ORM, Redis caching, and JWT authentication
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: FastAPI server runs on port 8100, WebSocket endpoints functional, database connections established, authentication endpoints working

userStories.title: Set up frontend with React/TypeScript
userStories.description: Initialize React 18 + TypeScript frontend with shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, and required libraries (Zustand, React Query, React Flow, etc.)
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: React app runs on port 3000, basic layout renders, routing configured, UI components imported

userStories.title: Implement authentication system
userStories.description: Build JWT-based authentication with role-based access control (Admin, Operator, Analyst, Auditor, Developer roles)
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Login/logout endpoints functional, JWT tokens issued, RBAC middleware working, protected routes secured

userStories.title: Create service proxy layer
userStories.description: Implement API proxy routes to forward requests to all 5 microservices (Orchestrator, Subagent Manager, Memory Service, MCP Gateway, Code Executor)
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: All proxy routes configured (/api/orchestrator/* -> localhost:8000, etc.), requests properly forwarded, error handling implemented

userStories.title: Build Command Center dashboard
userStories.description: Create the main hub dashboard with system health bar, KPI cards, live activity feed, quick actions, throughput chart, P&L summary, agent metrics, and model costs
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard renders all components, WebSocket connections active, real-time updates working, all KPIs display correctly

userStories.title: Implement Workflow Studio
userStories.description: Build drag-and-drop workflow builder with visual step configuration, model selection, artifact flow visualization, live execution overlay, YAML import/export, and template library
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Workflows can be created visually, steps configured, execution monitored in real-time, YAML export/import functional

userStories.title: Create Approval Center
userStories.description: Build approval management interface with pending approvals list, risk assessment display, AI thinking traces, provenance visualization, bulk operations, and audit trail
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Approvals display with all metadata, bulk approve/reject works, audit trail recorded, real-time updates

userStories.title: Develop Agent Control Center
userStories.description: Create agent management dashboard with active agents list, spawn configuration, capability assignment, performance metrics, utilization charts, and control actions
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Agents list displays, spawn/destroy actions work, metrics update in real-time, performance charts render

userStories.title: Implement Analytics and Settings dashboards
userStories.description: Build Analytics dashboard with performance metrics, system health, agent performance, and activity monitoring. Create Settings panel for system configuration management.
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Analytics dashboard displays metrics and charts, Settings panel allows configuration updates, data displays correctly, interactive features operational

userStories.title: Add real-time WebSocket integration
userStories.description: Implement WebSocket connections for live updates across all dashboards (/ws/activity-feed, /ws/approvals, /ws/workflows/{id}) with Redis PubSub backend
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: WebSocket connections stable, events broadcast correctly, <100ms latency achieved, reconnection handling works

userStories.title: Build P&L tracking system
userStories.description: Implement business intelligence with revenue/expense tracking, margin analysis, cost attribution, ROI calculations, budget alerts, and historical trends
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Financial data tracked accurately, charts display trends, alerts trigger on budget thresholds, reports generate correctly

userStories.title: Create conversational interface
userStories.description: Build 'Talk to King AI' interface with auto mode detection, inline workflow creation, execution confirmation, and live progress display
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Conversational input accepted, workflows created from text, execution monitored, responses displayed appropriately

userStories.title: Configure Docker Compose deployment
userStories.description: Create docker-compose.yml with all services (frontend, backend, PostgreSQL, Redis, Nginx) properly configured with correct ports and networking
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: docker-compose up starts all services, ports mapped correctly, services communicate properly, volumes configured

userStories.title: Implement service integration testing
userStories.description: Create comprehensive tests for API integrations, WebSocket connections, proxy routes, and cross-service communication
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: All integration tests pass, API calls work end-to-end, error scenarios handled, performance requirements met

userStories.title: Perform end-to-end testing
userStories.description: Conduct full system testing including user workflows, data persistence, real-time features, security validation, and performance benchmarking
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: All user stories functional, system stable under load, security validated, performance targets met (<1.5s page load, <200ms API response)
